title: TVS Motor sales rise 13% in July
description: TVS Motor Company on Monday reported a 13 per cent increase in total sales at 3,14,639 units in July.  The company had posted a total sales of 2,78,855 units in the same month last year, TVS Motor Company said in a statement.
